author: R. K.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2019
review_content: In June, I had a partial knee replacement removed and replaced with a total knee replacement. Surgery went textbook except my bone had deformed around the previous knee and much of my tibia (the larger, weight-bearing bone of the leg) broke off with the old knee. much prep work with spacers, new bone matric, etc had to be done before the new knee replacement could be evenly inserted and cemented. My quadriceps muscle was sliced longitudinally to allow access. For the first few days my hospital stay was great I walked, climbed stairs, had over 95 degrees range of motion. But massive localized inflammation set in on the 3rd day and because I have had 2 major stomach surgeries, I cannot swallow NSAIDS anti inflammatory drugs like Alleve, Ibuprofen, Naproxyn, etc., or even aspirin But my knee and legwere swollen to 44”from my normal size of 19-21”. The only medication that workedat all on the extreme painqnd swelling or this inflammatory response was a dangerous IV NSAID called toradol which I couldonly receive for 3 days while in hospital or risk losing my kidney funcion The anesthesiologists had  to administer it. I was sent home with opiod pain pills but nohing for the inflammation. By the next morning my knee was back up to 44”, hot, unable o bend, painful to try usi g my walker or cruzches. In the next few weeks, we tried a trial ofCelebrex,prescription-only diclofenac cream, doubl doses of Curcumin. Nothing helped. The Orthopedic surgeon had no suggestions. My husband, an emergency physician, had no ideas. I became so desperate that I took Alleve orally for 2 days until my gut began bleeding. My sister convinced me to pook at over the counter creams, that there must be one that had found anvehicle to get thir product through the many skin layers which are actually designed to keep these creams out. I agreed that if I found somthing ith at least one major ingredient for whoch there was some science, I would try it Thank the Lord, I found Penetrex cream before I gave up. I knew that oral homeopathic doe s of Arnica worked well on bruises and the pain of broken bones. I knew that oral Botswelia and Oral Glucosamine have shown to provide some relief but this was all in antopical cream. And it is not cheap but I was out of options & really did not believe I would get welluntil I could decrease or eliminate this inflammation. So I ordered the small size& when it arrived, I followedinstructions & massaged the appropriateamount into my knee and surrouding tissues. Smelled good, easy to absorb. Then I went about my reading until about 2 hours later, a strange feeling came over me & I beganchecking for what was wrong. Then it hit me like a hurricane — my knee wasn’t hot, the swelling was reduced and the pain was much lighter. I massaged in some more, and y t again after another 5 hours. when I awoke, I got out of bed without my walker, could actually begin to see my kneecap where once was just a blob and I could walk. At physical therapy later that day, I did the Pilates Teformer was cercises, could pedal the bicycle wheel all the time way over and had range of motion of 123 degrees. I put on more cream cheese hen I got home & more before bed. I slept through the night. Today I was able to repot over a doz n pots of flowers,cook supper, bathe myself, and even started work on a new quilt.Look this could all be coincidental. It could be that my knee is finally beginning to heal on its own. But I personally believe (andI am an epidemiologist married to a board-certified MD) that something  in this cream works on inflammation and lets me live a nearly normal, nearly painfree life just 3 minutes months after q complete knee replacement with partial bone replacement. If you have the money for a small size please try it on your inflammed area. It mike make all the difference in your life like it did in mind. And I will be glad to try and answer any questions
title: Can’t explain how but it works - please read

author: AwesomeReviews
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2018
review_content: I had surgery a few years back and have a lot of pain in my neck and lower back. There are times where my neck is so stiff I cant turn it without being in pain, or my back is so bad I am bent over even walking to the bathroom. My worst is in the morning when I sleep wrong I wake up really sore and my back thrown out. I also have carpel tunnel. I refused surgery because I am too scared to have it done. However, the pain is so intense I wear wrist braces often and have times where my fingers burn so much I can't do anything. I also have times where I pick something up and my hand literally feels like its been power shocked. If you have bad carpel you know what I mean. I was at a loss being in pain with everything I tried everything, heating pads on my back neck and hands, tens units, tons of creams that say they work as well as bio-freeze which I absolutely hate having the smell on me when I go out. I was at the end of my rope when I came across this product. I bought it with little hope it would help and was amazed at what it did. If I wake up with a sore back or neck, I rub this in and it instantly diminishes the pain at least 75 percent. I rubbed it into my hands and wrists and it helped my carpel tunnel at least 40- 50 percent. Hey if I can remove 50 percent of my carpel pain I am all for it. I fell as if it works better on my back and neck and less so on my wrists, however, this is just to let you know how much it helps because I would take being 10 percent better from all the pain I have. So 75 percent on my neck and back and 40-50 percent on my hands is a huge improvement for me. I have already went through 4 jars of this stuff and will continue to keep buying it. I get that it seems expensive, but for what it does its priceless. I also wanted to mention it does not have any burning feeling or any smell when you put it on. I can literally put it on and go to the store without feeling self conscious because of the smell. Highly recommend this product. Please push the helpful button below if I helped your decision. Thank you!

author: LaLa
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2018
review_content: I purchased this way back in December of 2017 as a Christmas gift for my parents. My dad has had a laryngectomy. Part of the procedure required the surgeon to create a muscle flap where they take muscle tissue from the chest and pull it up inside the body to where the larynx was. This fresh living tissue helps previously radiated tissue to heal. Where the doctors performed the muscle flap part of his surgery, he was really hurting. His whole shoulder was hurting. Plus, my mom has joint pain. She frequently has pain in her knees and sometimes, even though she has had carpal tunnel surgery, she still has pain in her wrists and arms. So I got this for them and guess what? They are rather stubborn and they just couldn't believe that this tiny and unassuming looking little pot of cream  could be any more effective than the over-the-counter stuff they've been using. They didn't use it. It just kind of sat around and I kept reminding them to please give it a try because I had read the reviews on Amazon that your relief will improve with continued use. Plus, this stuff is not exactly cheap for so small an amount either! I wanted them to at least give it a try before they wrote it off. Finally, here it is August of 2018 and my Mom finally decided to give it a try and she is impressed with the results. She started rubbing it on her knees and on her arms and over time she finds that she needs to use it less frequently because the results seem to be cumulative with this stuff. Whatever is in it, it really does help improve the pain over time.
title: Looks unassuming but is powerful...

author: A
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2019
review_content: While this product is highly effective in doing what it suggests, it is also quite dangerous for a large number of people.  Note, that it contains DMSO2, which means ALL of the components go directly into your blood stream, bypassing detoxification from your digestive system.  This makes the product more effective, but also makes it more dangerous for anyone that is even mildly allergic to any of the plant families they include, especially Arnica.  Arnica is technically a poison and for some people (myself included) they will get swollen lymph nodes and pain throughout the body.  I spoke with the CEO and asked they make a version that excludes Arnica.  They will not be making another version, sadly.  Otherwise I would give this product a higher rating.  Also be careful with this if you have hyper-tension that is related to your central nervous system.
title: Effective but risky

review_content: On the first night of application, about 2-3 hours later, I felt a overwhelming sense of euphoria that my lower back pain was almost 80% gone! At the same time I applied the cream one time on my other 3 brothers at around 8.30pm: 1 with lower backache for more than 10 years, 1 shoulder blade ache, 1 heel bone ache due to gout. All said the pain was almost 80% gone before they slept at about 11-12pm!Happily I continued using it. However, after about 10 days, the pain somehow came back slowly over the next few days. Eventually pain is back to its original intensity.I don't understand why. I really hope the cream work. Penetrex what happens?

date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2019
review_content: I bought this product based on other reviews about a month ago.  I was skeptical and wanted to try it out a few times before giving an honest review.  I have a large Osteoid Osteoma on my shin (benign bone tumor/growth) that has been there for 20 years.  Every so often, the pain inside flairs up so bad that I can barely walk. Nothing helps EXCEPT a HUGE dose of some kind of anti-inflammatory which can be dangerous if taken too long. Usually, I just suffer or succumb to taking the anti-inflammatory meds.  Because it seems like a condition that gets worse when inflamed, I decided to search for a topic solution that would help take inflammation down.  I searched and found this. I decided, why Not? What do i have to lose except some money.  I rubbed it on my shin like lotion and within MINUTES, Yes MINUTES, the sharpness of the pain DISAPPEARED. I was shocked!!! I felt no pain the rest of the night and I slept GREAT! (Sometimes the pain is so great that I cannot sleep!)  SERIOUSLY! If you suffer from anything due to an inflammation, GET THIS!ANOTHER Story - My 76 year old father has a hairline fracture in the knee, coupled with a knee replacement. As you can imagine, he's struggling a bit and trying to keep weight off, but also keep it in motion while it heels. He's miserable and its terribly inflamed. review_content: I suffered immense pain in right hand and wrist after I ended up using a walker due to a broken ankle. I ended up over doing it a bit just because it felt so good to be able to get from point A to point B without ending up in tears from the excruciating pain! author: Sai Kiran
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2020
review_content: To set some context, I'm 29 years old and maintain an above average active lifestyle. I run constant half marathons (except for now due to COVID) and play tennis 2-3 times a week. I first got to know about this product while searching on amazon to reduce inflammation. I've had issues with my knees and shoulders few years back due to lack of proper strength training, doing things the right way etc., which sometimes comes back to haunt me to this date.I was training for a full marathon and while I was increasing my mileage every week while keeping up with other activities, I realized that my joints were sore the next day more than usual. I used to apply ice packs and still do immediately after an activity, but the soreness and joint pains prevented me from doing any active recovery/proper stretching etc., I bought this one as this had thousands of 5 star reviews and thought what's the worse that could happen?Thinking back it's one of the best decisions I've made as it tremendously helps with my joint pains even now. Over the years I've suffered from tendonitis, joint pains in knees, shoulders (snowboarding falls), plantar fascitis and it has helped me in all of them. I even introduced this to my mom who has had a lower back surgery and also has knee pains. She loves this and always has it with her now. The cream itself is quick absorbing and easy to apply.I've also used the balm version of this and now a days I use that as I don't have to deal with manually applying the cream. I have a constant supply of this and ensure I order a new one as soon as I'm running out of one.
title: Must have for quick recovery. Just buy this!

author: Jak Spiez
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2016
review_content: I originally purchased this product, in the 2 oz size, from Amazon in order to help my wife find relief from her arthritis in her neck and back, which causes severe tension and migraine headaches.  She also has degenerative disc disease and early onset of osteoarthritis in her hands.  We both have been very pleased with the results that Penetrex has given us.  The best thing about this product is we can also use it on our two young boys ages 7 and 9.  It is not like icy hot, therefore it does not have the chemical reaction on your skin creating the icy/heat sensation.  However, when one of us is experiencing a headache, muscle tightness or pain in the neck and/or muscular stiffness and pain in the back we use Penetrex in conjunction with a moderate to deep tissue massage.  My wife and I have both found relief, although not instantaneous but throughout the rest of the evening the pain and stiffness starts to subside.  My wife is also able to sleep better once the Penetrex is applied before bed and we don't have to suffer from the strong smell of other topical creams.  We are true believers in, you get what you pay for, and this product has been worth every cent!!!
title: Finally true relief from a great product!!!!

author: Marcia C.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2020
review_content: I have polymyalgia rheumatica and suffer inflammation in my hands.  The pain gets so bad at times I can barely use by thumbs. I've tried other creams with not much relief.  But Penetrex is different.  First - scent is pleasing, not medicine smelling like some.  Second - it is not greasy, it absorbs well.  Third - IT WORKS!  Within a few minutes I feel less pain and stiffness.  After about 20 minutes I can do nearly any task I want with only minor discomfort if I try to do more than I really should.  Some days I can't properly use a mouse or keyboard, but after applying Penetrex I can do both, in moderation of course.  I even experimented with using it on one thumb and using another popular cream on the other, just to rule out simply massage being the real reason I got pain relief.  Penetrex was best by far.  I don't know how it would work on large joints, but for hands, this is a miracle product.  I can play in the sandbox with my granddaughter, that's more than worth the price of this cream!
title: Fantastic product!  Recommend for anyone with joint inflammation and pain.

author: SLD12DAY
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2018
review_content: As someone with Lupus, Rheumatoid arthritis and injuries from a long-ago accident, I have pain (sometimes unbearable) 24/7. As you can imagine, I have tried many products over the years in my quest to find some relief.A few areas I have an especially difficult time coping with pain are my low back, neck, and wrists/hands.I have tried Penetrex in the roll-on bottle and this one as a cream. I assume they are the same active ingredients, however, I receive faster and greater pain relief from the cream. It absorbs into the skin quickly with no greasy residue, and while it has a clean, pleasant scent, it too fades fast so I don’t smell like an alternative medicine apothecary. What does last is the pain relief-I am able to get several hours of relief from one application; enough to get tasks accomplished during the day or to get halfway decent sleep at night.  And a little goes a long way.It’s also worth mentioning that my husband has painful plantar fibromatosis and diabetic neuropathy in his feet. He is usually resistant to using any pain creams or ointments, but he actually requests that I rub the Penetrex into his feet when the pain is giving him a fit.What’s more is that I have extremely sensitive skin, but I have had zero adverse reaction to the Penetrex...no rashes, no itching, no redness...just relief. It is worth the price after having wasted plenty of money in other products that either didn’t work or messed up my skin.
title: Major relief from chronic pain

review_content: I woke up at around 3am with excruciating shoulder pain. I could not lift the arm due to the pain in my shoulder.  By the time I got to my doctor’s appointment for 1:30pm, I was able to raise my arm (I was unable to do that for the past 4.5 days) and move it again.It is now 9:25pm and it was like I never had an issue. author: Dustin_aka_D
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2021
review_content: I bought this because I needed something. My knees and lower body were sore every night. The first time I used it the pain was mild and if seemed to relieve it but I'm always sceptical so I thought it might be a placebo. The next time I used it was because my feet and legs were so sore I couldn't fall asleep because every little motion caused pain. Shortly after applying it I noticed a significant decrease in discomfort and was able to sleep easily. I hadn't really used it since because I'm stubborn and like to save it for really bad days. Every morning when I get out of bed and walk down stairs I take it slow and use the hand rail to help take some weight off my knees. Well last night I woke up to use the bathroom and getting out of bed my knees felt higher than normal discomfort so I slathered some on, worked it in and went back to sleep. When I woke up for work I walked down the stairs and it was almost pain free. No ordeal trying to gingerly walk down slowly. Then it hit me, just how great this stuff is. I have ordered a 3pack of the 4oz and knew I needed to leave a review. I buy hundreds of things online and never ever review them but I needed to this time. It doesn't completely eliminate pain, it's not a painkiller. Maybe it would if I used it regularly like the directions say but it makes it much more manageable. It's honestly a lifesaver. Hopefully someone reads this, takes a chance and can get out of bed pain free.

author: Duane Angell
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2019
review_content: This product is supposed to relieve inflammation, and that may take a few days. When the inflammation is relieved, the pain is relieved. But not all pain is caused by inflammation. There is some trial and error involved. I tried it on my lower back. First day nothing. But after 3 days I noticed that I was no longer watching the clock to see how long I have to wait before I can take my next pain pill. Yesterday I actually forgot to take one of my pain pills. I use about 1/4 teaspoon per treatment for a 3x3 inch area on my lumbar vertebrae and anticipate that I have enough cream to last at least a month.
title: There is a learning curve.  But it works for me!

author: P. Vitale
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2017
review_content: I used Penetrex in the past in hope that it would help a heel spur. it seemed inflamed and I tried it and I don't know if it did anything or not. Eventually the heel spur over a period of more than a year had stopped troubling me. I got new orthotics. (It's not the first time I've had heel spur issues). But two weeks ago I woke up with a "locked" knee.  I had been doing a lot of hill climbing with my bike and I think it just took its toll. I'm 72 so I've got to be careful with my joints especially knees. Gradually "locked" went to pain. So I tried Penetrex again. I had left over from my previous purchase of a couple of years ago and it seemed to be doing some good. I did some long distance walking and wasn't troubled by that.  So I ordered another jar and I put some on in the morning and before I go to bed. Feels pretty good right now and as soon as the weather improves I'm going back to bike riding.
title: Seemed to work

author: girlfriday
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2017
review_content: Oh how I love this stuff!  I will sing it's praises from the rooftops!!!  So seriously, if anyone mentions their pain to me, I immediately tell them about Penetrex.  It's been a true lifesaver to me.  I have had mild to severe lower back pain for several years now, that is no longer an issue thanks to this amazing product.  I have arthritis in my fingers/hands, that was getting so bad that I would sit in pain every night, and now it's not an issue at all.  I started using this as per directions and about 4 days in my back was rapidly improving, then my husband mentioned how I wasn't complaining about my hands anymore either.  I never even thought to put it on my hands specifically, it was just a by product of rubbing it in my back.  Amazing!  Everytime I come up with a new ache or pain, I start using and within a short time, I'm fine.  I pulled a muscle and put a crick in my neck after spending an evening face painting kids at a festival, and within two days of rubbing it into my neck, I was fine.  This is an injury that normally takes a week or two to get over for me!We originally bought this product for my husband, an avid runner, who was overcome with serious foot pain.  He was diagnosed with Morton's Neuroma by a doctor and put on three different medications to alleviate his symptoms.  As a teacher, he is on his feet all day, and after 3 weeks of meds and rest (as much as possible) he was not getting much relief at all.  I started researching to see if there was anything else that could help him and found this gem of a product.  After a week of 3 times a day application to his foot, he was off all the meds and walking normally.  It took another week of once or twice a day usage and he was back to running.It is not greasy or smelly or staining in any way.  It, in fact, smells amazing.  I have used it just as a straight up hand lotion at times.  I have tried prescription lidocaine gel, biofreeze, and many other products and this is NOTHING like those other products.  It's as nice as using a high end lotion and getting pain relief to boot.  I will never be without this product again and it will go with me anywhere I go for the rest of my life. author: R. K.

review_content: In June, I had a partial knee replacement removed and replaced with a total knee replacement. My quadriceps muscle was sliced longitudinally to allow access. For the first few days my hospital stay was great I walked, climbed stairs, had over 95 degrees range of motion. But massive localized inflammation set in on the 3rd day and because I have had 2 major stomach surgeries, I cannot swallow NSAIDS anti inflammatory drugs like Alleve, Ibuprofen, Naproxyn, etc., or even aspirin But my knee and legwere swollen to 44”from my normal size of 19-21”. The only medication that workedat all on the extreme painqnd swelling or this inflammatory response was a dangerous IV NSAID called toradol which I couldonly receive for 3 days while in hospital or risk losing my kidney funcion The anesthesiologists had  to administer it. I was sent home with opiod pain pills but nohing for the inflammation. By the next morning my knee was back up to 44”, hot, unable o bend, painful to try usi g my walker or cruzches. In the next few weeks, we tried a trial ofCelebrex,prescription-only diclofenac cream, doubl doses of Curcumin. Nothing helped. The Orthopedic surgeon had no suggestions. My husband, an emergency physician, had no ideas. I became so desperate that I took Alleve orally for 2 days until my gut began bleeding. My sister convinced me to pook at over the counter creams, that there must be one that had found anvehicle to get thir product through the many skin layers which are actually designed to keep these creams out. I agreed that if I found somthing ith at least one major ingredient for whoch there was some science, I would try it Thank the Lord, I found Penetrex cream before I gave up. I knew that oral homeopathic doe s of Arnica worked well on bruises and the pain of broken bones. I knew that oral Botswelia and Oral Glucosamine have shown to provide some relief but this was all in antopical cream. And it is not cheap but I was out of options & really did not believe I would get welluntil I could decrease or eliminate this inflammation. So I ordered the small size& when it arrived, I followedinstructions & massaged the appropriateamount into my knee and surrouding tissues. Smelled good, easy to absorb. Then I went about my reading until about 2 hours later, a strange feeling came over me & I beganchecking for what was wrong. Then it hit me like a hurricane — my knee wasn’t hot, the swelling was reduced and the pain was much lighter. I massaged in some more, and y t again after another 5 hours. when I awoke, I got out of bed without my walker, could actually begin to see my kneecap where once was just a blob and I could walk. At physical therapy later that day, I did the Pilates Teformer was cercises, could pedal the bicycle wheel all the time way over and had range of motion of 123 degrees. I put on more cream cheese hen I got home & more before bed. I slept through the night. Today I was able to repot over a doz n pots of flowers,cook supper, bathe myself, and even started work on a new quilt.Look this could all be coincidental. It could be that my knee is finally beginning to heal on its own. But I personally believe (andI am an epidemiologist married to a board-certified MD) that something  in this cream works on inflammation and lets me live a nearly normal, nearly painfree life just 3 minutes months after q complete knee replacement with partial bone replacement. If you have the money for a small size please try it on your inflammed area. It mike make all the difference in your life like it did in mind. And I will be glad to try and answer any questions

author: A
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2019
review_content: While this product is highly effective in doing what it suggests, it is also quite dangerous for a large number of people.  Note, that it contains DMSO2, which means ALL of the components go directly into your blood stream, bypassing detoxification from your digestive system.  This makes the product more effective, but also makes it more dangerous for anyone that is even mildly allergic to any of the plant families they include, especially Arnica.  Arnica is technically a poison and for some people (myself included) they will get swollen lymph nodes and pain throughout the body.  I spoke with the CEO and asked they make a version that excludes Arnica.  They will not be making another version, sadly.  Otherwise I would give this product a higher rating.  Also be careful with this if you have hyper-tension that is related to your central nervous system.
title: Effective but risky
