author: wizardofozone
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2019
review_content: All my life I've watched ridiculous commercials from gushing actors claiming 'miracles' from instant weight loss to going from a wheelchair to becoming an Olympic track star and all due to some 'miracle' product and of course it's all a bunch of crap ... Now this Penetrex has become a real problem for me because it makes me feel just like one of those phoney paid actors on tv .... but with one exception ... I'm telling the truth. This stuff IS a miracle ,at least for me ....  I'm really startled because it is only my first day with this product and already I have been relieved of pain and can turn my head in ways I haven't been able to do for 25 years ...  I don't know if that's what will happen for you as well but I'd sure as heck try it if I were you ... I promise I am telling you a truthful fact, the stuff is amazing ....
title: Product makes you feel like a liar

author: bookaddict01
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2020
review_content: I've bought several jars of this because it works well.  I rub it on sprains and bruises so they hurt less.  Doesn't have much of a scent although I have not had occasional to put it on anywhere near my face.  I gave a jar to my pharmacist friend when she was having back pain and none of her pills seem to be helping.  She said it worked really well and she felt relief that day.  I also gave a jar to my brother when he was having pain in his thumb from trigger finger but it didn't help.  Keep in mind none of his doctor's suggestions helped either.
title: like it

author: smhbarton
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2019
review_content: I suffer from lower back and hip pain and when I apply this cream the pain either lessens significantly or goes away completely, depending on the severity of the pain I'm experiencing that particular day.  I just reviewed my past orders and realized that I've ordered 8 jars over the past 3 years, so that is indeed proof that it must work or else I wouldn't keep ordering it.  Before using Penetrex I tried several other topical pain relievers which smelled terrible and didn't work at all.  Penetrex works and it doesn't stink!  No one else even knows I'm using it because they can't smell it.  A big plus!  I highly recommend this cream.  Yes, it's a little pricey but like you've probably always heard, you get what you pay for!  Buy it!
title: This cream REALLY works!

author: Marshall S.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2019
review_content: Penetrex is the only stuff I have bought that doesn't stink or burn or tingle, which leads me to believe it isn't working. The thing is though, every time I rub it in I feel better (which I thought might be the rubbing that relieves my tight muscles), but then I wake up and feel so much better. It is witchcraft - but I am ok with that. Don't know why it works without me actually feeling it work, but that is ok. Don't fool yourself that it doesn't do anything, give it a shot. I will be honest, I bought the cream and got a sample of the roll-on. The cream is amazing but the roll-on doesn't seem to do the same trick. Not sure why, it is much thinner - maybe the thickness of the cream helps to absorb. I don't know, I am not a witch - so I don't know how to make magic potions or why they work. Buy the cream and give it a shot.
title: No scent or sensation - works well

author: barbara
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2020
review_content: I was not expecting much when I ordered this because so many similar products promise results that in reality leave much to be desired.This stuff is incredible!  I hung a long mantel shelf on the wall, after which my upper back, neck and shoulder were knotted up and I could not move my head or my arm without intense pain.  After some minutes of suffering, I remembered that I had purchased Penetrex cream.  This was a great opportunity to put it to the ultimate test.It passed with flying colors!  The pain and stiffness started to ease soon after rubbing this in and within a half hour or so I had absolutely no pain, knots or tender spots, and range of motion had returned to normal.I am impressed and I highly recommend this product.
title: WOW!

author: John
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2019
review_content: I am only relating what Penetrex does for me...this is only an observation and  in no way has the Penetrex  Company implied or stated the validity of any of my observations.  I do not offer this as medical advice, but only what has happened with my use of the product.  I always keep a jar of Penetrex handy for sore muscles.  I have for years had dyshidrotic eczema on the base of my fingers of my right hand.  This is an itchy, blistery callus that is more annoying than painful.  I found that applying Penetrex to the area for a week makes the entire area dry up and disappear.  Gone.  Now this is something that I have had for years and now...gone.  That being said, I had a dry, scaly patch of skin on my shoulder...kind of one of those permanent things you can always have.  Rubbed some Penetrex in and within a few weeks it dried up and brushed away.  This is not a recommended use of the product, but as a skin cream...it's amazing.
title: Amazing Stuff

author: Linda Y
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2020
review_content: There is nothing to dislike about Penetrex!!  It works and it works fast! My husband and I are both in our 70s and use it for different aches and pains.  He uses it primarily on his low back but has had me rub it on his neck and shoulder area.  I use it for neck pain, shoulder pain ( torn rotator )  and most recently I've tried it on my right hip in which I have bursitis.  It truly is a god-send for us.  We are on our second jar--Gee, it lasts a long time and now I have my cousin and her neighbor both getting same type results for their issues. ( one with knee issues and the other with scapula scarring and after-surgery pain.  I think every house should have at least a small jar for those unexpected pains.  We will always keep it in our home and we even take it with us on trips.  I'm thankful for whoever came up with this stuff.
title: Most amazing, pain-reliefer we have ever found

author: Just me in wv
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2019
review_content: Okay, I don't know what is in this stuff, but it caused my hands, feet and knees to swell for almost a week.  I was convinced I had developed severe rheumatoid arthritis over night.  I had injured my thumbs lifting grandbaby.  I had bought this on the advice of a relative, so I thought I would try it out on my hands.  OH.MY.WORD.  I was seriously thinking I was needing to get on disability.  Might work well for some, but I must be allergic to it. I had to take prednisone to get swelling to subside.  Also it CANNOT be returned, had I known I would not have ordered it.  Since it was amazon prime I assumed it was returnable.
title: NON RETURNABLE! BEWARE!

author: PMD68
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2019
review_content: My husband needs knee replacement. He’s been told his knee situation  is bone on bone. He had been having a lot of pain. He’s a realtor and plans to retire in the fairly near future. He hoped to put off knee replacement until after retirement. The pain was getting bad enough that he was about ready to give up and have the surgery, which would have meant a big financial hit since he’s self employed.I don’t remember where I heard about Penetrex but I decided to buy it and for him it’s been amazing. Of course I don’t know if continuing to walk on the knee is a bad thing but I do know he’s able do it with much less pain. He’ll have the surgery as soon as he retires.I don’t know if everyone will have the same results but for my family this is an unbelievable  product. Just hope they never stop making it.
title: This is the one product on Amazon I would most hate to see disappear!

author: Wood
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2020
review_content: I found this stuff a while back and absolutely love it. It works like none other. It was able to relieve me from chronic jumper's knee pain that I suffered from for years. I also developed tendonitis and knew exactly what to use - Penetrex. Tennis elbow - no more.  You name it - neck pain, muscle aches, chronic pain that won't budge from OTC remedies. This stuff really works - at least for me it does. The scent is very light; rubs in nicely; and is simply easy to deal with. I'm a believer and will always swear by it.
title: Works when nothing else does.

author: Susan M. Gantner
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2021
review_content: Both my husband and myself have problems with arthritis, especially in our hands. Penetrex works best of all the things we've tried. Little or no smell. Don't expect it to get warm when you put it on like many others do. Just give it a little time and the pain goes away. I actually prefer the roll on version because it doesn't require I get the cream on my hands. But the cream is very effective and seems easier to find than the cream.
title: Really helps arthritis flare ups in my hands

author: C. Attle
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2017
review_content: About 6 weeks ago I developed a pain that started in my left shoulder blade and within a few days had spread to my left shoulder joint, left deltoid, left chest muscle, and my left arm. The pain was so intense that it made me knock off work and go to my doctor's office. I thought I was having a heart attack but the doctor assured me that my symptoms showed the pain was due to a strained muscle, tendon or ligament. For over a week, I treated the pain with Aspercreme (lidocaine). capsaicin, Salonpas, Bengay, and ibuprofen. Then I found Penetrex and started applying it 3 times a day but I also kept using the Aspercreme, capsaicin, Salonpas, and Bengay. By the third day I was able to stop taking the ibuprofen. And now it is the seventh day and I find myself needing fewer applications of the Aspercreme, capsaicin, Salonpas and Bengay on a daily basis. I gave Penetrex 4 stars because I did not get instant relief as a lot of other posters have claimed, but I do like it enough to endorse it and will be purchasing it again.
title: but I do like it enough to endorse it and will be purchasing ...

author: Ramses
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2018
review_content: From aching back to arthritis joint problems - this product (Made in USA!) has been a lifeline for our family! Our elder parents have been complaining about their pain symptoms and no matter what we tried (Arnica helps a bit), we recycled too many products that promised the advertised relief.Since 2016, we ordered Penetrex multiple times to replenish our home "apothecary" as well as our elder parents' stock. This cream is formulated and made in the USA, which is unusual. The company and the customer service stand by the product. Fast with their responses and genuine approach to problem resolution. We have communicated with them and their responses via e-mail are within 24 hours. Very courteous and polite.The cream. From lower back pain to joints on hands - works like a charm. Recently have been applying to feet for RLS and it works perfectly as well. Applying pea-sized quantity takes care of the problematic pain.Formulation - no additives. Plain, clean product with ingredients one expects.  No mad science behind it, but pure ingredients and no greasy residue after applying it to the skin. Skin is the largest organ and whatever we apply to it - becomes part of us. So, we feel good about applying this cream that works perfectly relieving pain symptoms.As long as Penetrex does not get sold to some giant corporation that will mess-up this AWESOME product!HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!A+
title: Penetrex is the lifeline for those with arthritis and pain!!!

author: Mac4
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2019
review_content: People who suffer chronic pain know the drill. You try all the things, hoping to find the one that can really help. Once you're a few products in, you know better than to expect miracles. You just want to take the edge off so you can be comfortable enough to fall asleep and stay that way. Maybe you want to engage in normal physical activity, once in awhile, without needing to do a cost benefit analysis to determine if it's worth the pain.I am very happy this works for some people. It didn't work for me, used as directed, which ain't cheap btw. I would like a refund since the product description indicates you can get one if it doesn't work for you. However, Amazon says this item can not be returned or refunded. Disappointed.
title: It smells good, it feels good going on...but it didn't take the edge off my  pain.

author: BUTTER
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2019
review_content: Did not work for me. I used this product two weeks before my review to see if it would need time to penetrate into my lower back area. NOTHING. Would not buy again and would not recommend.
title: NO PAIN RELIEF

author: R. Carlson
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2013
review_content: I'm 55 and I have had arthritis in both my thumbs for about 10 years. Kind of odd, I don't have it anywhere else, but try not using your thumbs for a day and you'll see the problem.In the last couple of years it's gotten worse (confirmed by x-ray - the cartilage is gone). I consulted a surgeon who said I was too young for any type of surgery (hint: The only thing available is to fuse the bones -- yikes!) - he thought steroid injections would lead to further deterioration so he recommended a splinting procedure to allow the joint s to rest -  you wear thumb splints - they're uncomfortable and inconvenient, and they mobilize your thumbs - but they do help. Obviously, I would love a better solutions (I'm an IT guy - I type a lot including using my thumbs)I tried a lot of OTC pain medications including Arthritis cremes, Blue Emu, which BTW, I believe is a very fine muscle application, but does not touch the arthritis, and other topicals, like Tiger Balm and Cobra Venom most of which have been largely useless.Nothing except Penetrex has ever come close to touching the deep bone-on-bone pain I feel in my thumbs.Obviously, it's not magic. It does not replace cartilage but it seems to have anti-inflammatory properties similar to a mild dose of steroids (with none of the side-effects). I find my movement range increases and the pain is significantly reduced when I grip something - the pain is not "gone" but I'm no longer wincing from it when I open a bottle or grip a tool.I have also tried competitive preparations, including CT creme which has some of the same main ingredient  (Arnica) and found them ineffective. Basically, there's something in Penetrex that just works. Note that studies on Arnica, a type sunflower, support it's anti inflammatory use (go look it up on google - "arnica studies") although there's no compelling studies to validate it's use in arthritis pain, so take this review with a grain of salt - these are personal experiences.That being said, after my success with Penetrx,  I recommended it to several colleagues who found the same and I also regularly purchase it for my 94 year old father who complained of the same "Bone-on Bone" pain in his back and shoulders. I also have not needed to use my thumb splints for about 6 months now since starting to use Penetrx, so regardless of any studies, I'm very satisfied with the results.The good: It smells GREAT - it's not sticky, or slick --  there's a VERY mild hint of mint and it actually leaves your skin feeling smooth and clean.The great: Over time it reduces inflammation and  you actually need to use less of itThe not-so-great: It takes time to work, it's easily twice the cost of something like  Blue Emu, BUT it kills pain that other topicals cannot touch.Usage - I would make it clear again that this is medicine, not magic. It goes to work very slowly. Whereas you might expect a topical like something with Menthol (icy hot or the like)  to work quickly I've found it takes about a week or even two to "ramp up" with Penetrex. That being said, once it does, it's very effective and you need less of it on a less frequent basis.I've tried Penetrex at times on more "muscular" aches and pains and actually would not recommend it for this purpose (it works too slowly and it's too expensive), but if you've got deep, chronic "bone on bone" ache, give it a try  (and give it a chance - I'd recommend using an entire 2 ounce treatment over two to three weeks before making any decisions) and I suspect you'll  find significant value in the treatment.I did, my 94 year old Dad did and my friend who's just recovering from spinal surgery did too.Do your own homework, then give it a try and let others know what you think. Look at the star ratings here as well - as of this date, over 1600 of the 2000 ratings are 4-5 starts with the majority in the 5 star range. Either that's a lot of placebo talking, or these guys have figured something out.Either way, I'm happy and will continue to buy the product my purposes - long term relieve of bone-on-bone pain.
title: Excellent Long Term Treatment for Bone-on-Bone pain

author: EJ
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2017
review_content: I had my ACL knee reconstruction surgery on  July 12, 2017. The area around my knee, ankle and leg were in a lot of pain. I bought the Penetrex 3 weeks before the surgery and I started to use it a lot after the surgery. Wow, even though it doesn't really take out the pain completely, Penetrex did give me some relief from the pain when my wife massage my right foot which the ACL knee surgery was performed with Penetrex.I started to use Penetrex around my right leg and the pain became very manageable after that. On the 2nd day, I didn't even have to take my Hydrocodone narcotic pain medication. I only took the Naproxen and OTC acetaminophen on the 2nd day after the surgery. The pain was bad but it was manageable with Penetrex.Today is the 2nd week after the surgery, I ordered 3 more containers of Penetrex 3 days ago and last night I could not sleep from the pain from my ankle.Thankfully the Amazon prime shipping tracking system said that package arrived in the evening outside my door. I opened my door at 3 am and there was my Penetrex. Instead of taking Tylenon, I applied Penetrex right away on the ankle and the pain was gone and I was able to sleep around 4 am.It has been wonderful to have the penetrex around to manage my pain.
title: This product really gives me a great relief from pain after my ACL knee reconstruction surgery!

author: J. Howard
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2020
review_content: I waited  a while to review this because I wanted to use it for a while. I used this cream for issues with Plantar Fasciitis, IT Band pain, arthritis in my thumbs and groin muscle pull. (geez, I sound like a mess, lol)  For my plantar fasciitis if massaged it into the area 2-3 times a day for the first couple of days, then daily while it was still giving me issues and it really did provide relief. It's not a cure-all, but it reduces pain and enables me to not eat Advil like Skittles. Used in conjunction with other treatments (icing, etc.) my PF is gone. It says to massage in and I think that is very important. I've recently been using it to relieve the pain of a nagging groin pull that flares up. Again, I think the massaging is almost as important as the cream itself. The scent is pleasant and really not that noticable. It doesn't feel greasy afterwards either. Like I said, it is not a cure-all but really is effective along with other treatment.
title: Not a miracle cure, but it is effective!

author: Brian S.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2020
review_content: I strained my forearm from repetitive motion, which resulted in tendinitis, and was looking at various ways to help with the pain and smooth my recovery time.  Aside from using a compression sleeve for that arm, I started using Penetrex as a friend of mine recommended using something with peppermint oil in it.  I have to say that it definitely helped quite a bit with my recovery and pain management.  It won't reduce the pain to zero, so I have some slight discomfort, but it makes it so that I can get through the day and work at rebuilding the muscle and healing back to normal.  It is very easy to apply and has only a slight medicinal scent, so it won't cause problems unless you have a sensitivity.  But, for the price, it is a really good option to help with pain management and healing.
title: Good option for tendinitis

author: Kindle Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2020
review_content: Most of us experience pain at flu shot injection & tetanus shot sites, ugh. My pain can last one to two days & that pain causes a headache, to add insult to injury. It occurred to me that I hadn't tried my purchase yet, nearly two years out. I rubbed the equivalent of three thin layers over the flu shot injection area, and within 5 minutes, the pain was nearly gone, only present with light palpation or touch to the area. The full, aching pain was gone. When Mom got her flu shot a week later, I applied it to her arm, too, knowing how much it had helped me. I expected it to smell like Ben-Gay, but it did not; there's hardly any smell. Anyhow, I'd highly recommend Penetrex for its pain-relieving effectiveness.
title: Helpful for relieving pain at flu shot site!

author: IdyGal
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2019
review_content: I've given this product a second chance and still am unimpressed.  I had scoliosis in my lumbar spine and have had 7 surgeries to correct it.  I am left with peripheral neuropathy down both legs and inner thighs with residual numbness and tingling.  I have chronic back spasms too.  My husband and used this on my back and it is 'just okay.'  I don't see any difference between Penetrex and other such meds.  Actually, plain old lotion or sunflower seed oil works just as well for me.  I don't think it is the active ingredients that help but the physical response to the massaging of it in.  I won't be purchasing more.
title: Meh......  Not for me.  (7 back surgeries)

author: mar
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2019
review_content: Product was intended to provide some pain relief to my joints but despite my efforts I am still having pain. I plan to continue using it a few more days in hope to feel a bit better
title: So far no pain relief at all.

author: CU
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2019
review_content: I am so happy to report that PENETREX is very effective for joint pain, and inflammation.  Relief for me takes place right away, within an hour at most; however, after applying 2x a day (as directed) and after continued use within one week, the relief results are absolutely AMAZING!.  I use the cream to apply to my knees and joints, and also ordered the Roll-on, which allows easier application on hard to reach areas - like back of neck and lower spine.  Roll-on is just as effective as the cream.  I'm spreading the word to family & friends.  Incidentally, a friend of mine has Rheumatoid Arthritis and claims that PENETREX is helping her too, she's been ordering it for months now.  If you are restricted from taking oral or topical prescription anti-inflammatory medication, as I am now (since I took them for years and they have wreaked havoc on my digestive system) - TRY PENETREX - IT IS SAFE & EFFECTIVE.
title: Great Product - REALLY WORKS!

author: JudithKay
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2020
review_content: I did something to my RIGHT shoulder, while helping my husband unload his truck. Its been getting worse and worse for about 3 months. I thought I was going to have to give in and get surgery to fix it...then spend 6 months recovering. I tried numerous creams, nothing worked, just gave me a menthol rush on my skin. This was the last cream I was going to try. Got it today, my shoulder was really bad today, throbbing, and pinching and my bicep was killing me..I tried about a quarter size glob and rubbed it into my shoulder and bicep, then had to get my husband off to work, and let the dogs out...so maybe 5 minutes later...I noticed it!!! Sweet lord in heaven...no pain, no throbbing, no pinching, and I can move my arm..OMG!!! Im sold!! Im almost in tears at the thought of being able to sleep tonight...THANK YOU!!...I will update in a week or so..
title: OMG!!! It works...my pain is gone...!!!!

author: Happy
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2019
review_content: I love this stuff so much I have bought it 9 times. (I'm not in that much pain, but have athletic friends who appreciate the sore muscle relief.) Years ago, I searched Amazon for topical pain killer and Penetrex popped up.  I first got it for tendonitis that had lasted several weeks.  With Penetrex, the tendonitis pain was gone almost instantly and the inflammation disappeared within 24 hours!  Amazing!  I then used it for  pulled muscles in my back.  Works great!  I also rubbed it on my feet for plantar fasciitis.  It helped relieve pain, (but, alas did not cure).  I've given Penetrex as a present to family and friends who now swear by it.  I've used arnica, which is good,  but Penetrex is so much more powerful.  Penetrex is like the InstantPot of pain relievers: I found it on Amazon and it works way better than expected.  Since I have bought so many jars of Penetrex, they are sending me a free roll-on version.  What a friendly gesture!  I look forward to trying it.
title: The Instant Pot of Pain Relievers: Fast acting, versatile, and way better than expected

author: Adjobanibongo
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2017
review_content: Listen...I am as skeptical as can be...Inhave been suffering with tennis elbow for months...I had done sone research and found there was a brace that you can use to relieve the pain...so I searched on AMAZON and I saw this cream...I always read the reviews on any item I buy and I start from the lowest to the highest..this product has a ton of great reviews...but I wasnt convinced..I started scrolling thru looking for that phrase..."I received this item at a dscounted price for my review"...i didnt see any...hmmm..were people paying for this item..Full price...and still saying it works?...I gotta try it...I did..and well..It worked so well I FORGOT I had Tennis Elbow...this is a great product...cure..naw..but it will help you relieve your pain so you can function..no more pain medication for me...making me groggy and unable to function.. This is all I need..oh yeah..It also worked on my carpal tunnel and shoulder pain as well..getting old sucks..LOL. ..THANK YOU!!!
title: I WAS GLAD TO BE PROVEN WRONG

author: Carrie Phelps
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2017
review_content: I cannot tell you how much I love this product.  I was leary at first.  I have trigger finger in both of my thumbs.  At times the surrounding muscles hurt so much I could barely stand it.  I had steroid shots in both hands and it helped some.  Penetrex however,  I have been using for a few months and my thumbs are actually healing.  Severe trigger finger usually requires surgery.  I would have had to leave work for 12+ weeks.  The $20 I spent on this not only saved me from surgery but it's actually working to naturally heal the tissue in my thumbs and surrounding muscles.  While it might not be 100% healed I'd say it feels 90% healed.  I had a friend with planter fasciitis who's heals were killing him.  He tried it once. Within the hour he felt little to no pain. Bought It that night for himself.  It also helps reduce those hard to deal with tension headaches.  Rub some on your neck and shoulder muscles.  Wait 30 minutes and you'll see a major difference.  Try it out.  It's worth it. If I would promote this all day if I could.
title: This company did it right!  Excellent product

author: Linda A. Bradley
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2018
review_content: UPDATE 8-21-18:I have been applying 3-4 times a day for about a week now, and I honestly cannot BELIEVE the pain relief I have gotten.  It's not gone. but it is so diminished that I am hoping with continued use it may disappear completely.  I addition to my hand, I am using on my right shoulder and both knees with equal success.  For an investment  of under $20.00, what have you got to lose?  Hopefully you'll be one of the lucky ones like me, who swears by this stuff.  If not, no big loss.  I am seriously telling everyone I know about this product.ORINGAL REVIEW:I have had horrible pain on my hand, from the base of the thumb, down towards the wrist, for over a year now.  If you are familiar with Sciatica pain?  That's what this feels like.  And using this stuff only a few times?  I am already getting relief.There are lots of great reviews for Penetrex on Amazon, and lots of bad ones.  You will have to try it yourself to know if it will work for you.  I am really happy I did.
title: AMAZING PAIN RELIEF!!!

author: StephAA
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2020
review_content: I found Penetrex about 4 yrs ago. I suffer from herninated disk since I was 23 and this is the only topical cream that works for pain relief. My doc perscribed medicine which helps with the inflammation but anytime I feel a flare up or any sign of my back may give out I put Penetrex on amd the pain goes away within 15-20 min. I love this stuff and have recommended it to mamy family members. My mom uses it for her sciatica pain as well. HIGHLY RECOMMEND! YOU WON'T REGRET IT!
title: Must buy and keep stocked!

author: InArizona
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2019
review_content: One's expectations would heavily influence their reviews for this product. The company and the other reviewers built this cream up to be almost life-changing. For those reviewers whose lives were changed, that's wonderful. In my case, it didn't happen.I just suffer from everyday aches and pains as you get older—especially after working out. Perhaps it's imagined, but I do think there is some medicinal value to the cream. I think it does help. How much it really helps is tough to quantify.The company seems to have a solid return policy, and there are a enough reviewers who claim the product helps, so maybe give it a shot. I am not sure exactly what I was expecting from using the cream (having the recovery power of a 20YO or something like it) but it didn't quite measure up.Still, the cream doesn't smell bad. It dries quickly, and it's not greasy.
title: Miracle cure? Nope, but it does have some medicinal value

author: Jan
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2018
review_content: Did not feel the same relief that I had with my first jar that I bought months ago. It had really worked before on my bad knee.I still want to believe in the product but for now, I am shelving it here at home and it is just not proving effective.I will use it up before it expires but not sure I will re-purchase in case I get another "bad batch". I do not recommend the roll on one either. That was a waste of cash.
title: It had really worked before on my bad knee. I still want to believe in the ...

author: MickeyT
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2019
review_content: OMG. As a Nurse I am very skeptical when there is a miracle cream that elevates pain, numbness, and tingling sensations caused by any serious disease process. However, I have some peripheral neuropathy in my feet that used to keep me in bed for days until I could even walk again much less put on shoes and go to work. After only one application of this cream, I could feel something was happening. After two applications (in the same day) I felt an even stronger urge that something was happening as the shooting pain had stopped. After three applications (same day) my feet started to tingle and I realized it was the feeling coming back in my feet and not the neuropathy  numbness. On day two I got up in the morning and could actually walk, with a limp, and the pain was almost all gone. I applied the cream again three times that day and with each application, my feet were feeling better. The coldness was gone in my feet, the feeling was back, and the limp was diminishing. I could sleep without shooting pain and tingling numbness in my feet and toes. I am going to order more of this fantastic product immediately. This has done in a few days what medicines and bed rest have been unable to do for years! Thank you Penetrex, you are simply amazing!
title: This is the real deal

author: Kindle Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2015
review_content: I bought this to try on my upper back. I have issues with my cervical spine and the muscles getting too tight, causing headaches. One of the draws for me was the ingredients including Arnica. I have used Arnica cream in the past, which has shortened the life of bruises, as well as taken Arnica tabs orally for bruising. I have been through several rounds of physical therapy, have every tool and piece of equipment needed including ultrasound for my back to control the muscle spasms. I found to my pleasant surprise that the cream does help! I don't write a lot of feedback, but it has helped with my cervical spine and scalings (muscles on the side/front of neck that get tight.) It works as long as I use it consistently when I am having issues. The directions say you can use it 3-4 times a day. I found even using it morning and night help. It doesn't have the strong smell of other muscle creams on the market, but more of a light scent.We have found other uses for it in our household. Our teenager is an athlete and it has worked at night after a good workout and shower for him to use on his legs, back, arms or whatever muscles are aching. He says he feels better in the morning.I definitely recommend having this in your medicine cabinet if anyone in your household has muscle or back pain or does sports. It is a topical cream that blends easily (not too heavy) and has natural anti-infllammatory properties that work.
title: Great for sore muscles, back, and for athletes!

author: A. Tru Delight
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2020
review_content: What miracle hath Penetrex wrought? Having spent the better part of the past week wracked with pain so excruciating the thought crossed my mind -- not that I'd ever act upon it, but I now have personal, experiential understanding of the impulse -- "Somebody PLEASE put me outta my misery!"Then, my Amazon order, including my 2oz jar of Penetrex, came this morning, right in the nick of time! As soon as I got it upstairs, I opened it, and rubbed it into the center of greatest nerve pain from my regenerating sciatic nerve, my left shin.(6 years ago I was almost run over by a reckless underinsured driver. Due, I suspect, to continued pressure from massive hematomas in that leg, my left sciatic nerve -- the big nerve that starts in the small of you back, cuts across your buttock, branches off in your groin, and down both sides of your leg, innervating your muscles and joints, all the way down to your toes -- had much of it's function literally crushed, thus limiting the function of my left leg. Since I've recently been concerned that the muscles of my left leg are STILL considerably smaller than those of my right -- AND, I could barely move my toes at all, much less move my big toe separately from the others -- I'd been intensely working my left leg, foot, and toes.(Gradually, I saw results; even my bunion appeared to be straightening. Even the arch of my left began rebuilding itself! Then, last weekend my left sciatic nerve started acting up. I thought is was just a a garden variety sciatic attack. But as time progressed, the pain went down my leg on both sides, eventually along the entire length of my left sciatic nerve. The pain pulsed, moved, and twitched -- first in spasms, then in waves. Since my 6 years of rebuilding and rewiring my body has left me keenly aware of my internal goings on, I KNEW it was my left sciatic nerve regenerating itself. And it was so intense, I suspect the only worse pain would be labor pain, or extreme burns, like the time my foot was scalded by hot bacon grease.)As soon as I rubbed the Penetrex into the outside of my left calf, my mind cleared as the pain drained from that area of my leg. I immediately rubbed it everywhere my left leg and buttock hurt. The pain drained away, as if by magic! This stuff is as good as, if not better than prescription Voltarin!I felt SO good, I went grocery shopping, which had been needed for daze; but my pain had procluded -- expecting I'd need to collapse into a hot salt bath as soon as I got home. But not so fast! Not only was I able to put all my groceries away as soon as I returned, 2 and a half hours later, my pain is still subsided!I've tried other similar products over the years -- some with even longer lists of homeopathic, herbal, and essential oil ingredients -- but THIS IS IT, the Holy Grail of Topical Pain Relief. I suspect that has something to do with their delivery system. No wonder they call it Penetrex! Merci beaucoup, Penetrex! I'll love you forever! 💋
title: What Miracle Hath Penetrex Wrought?

author: Misty
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2017
review_content: This cream has helped my family tremendously. I bought it for my father who was experiencing a lot of knee pain due to a torn meniscus. I live in Oregon where marijuana is legal, so I bought him some CBD oil to rub into his knee in hopes of alleviating some of his pain. It was working but was really expensive and my dad lives in Arizona so it was not something readily available to him. So I set out to find a comparable alternative.  That is when I came across penetrex on amazon and read all the glowing reviews. I thought I would give it a try and have some sent to my dad. Not only did my dad try it, but he became obsessed with it. He swears it is better than the much pricier CBD oil. Now my entire family uses it. I am just so thankful for Penetrex. It is so difficult to watch someone you love in pain and I can't help but be grateful that there is something that lessens my dad's struggle and gives him a break from his pain. I am confident and we will be lifetime users.
title: Effective!

author: FractionMeister
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2017
review_content: I deal with some awful diseases in my feet, one in the nerves and one in the bones. And, the pain I encounter on a daily basis is almost more than I can physically bear. I take multiple meds to help with the pain, even opioid pain relief, and some days, nothing touches the pain.That is until I found Penetrex. To this day, I still don't know how I found it. Literally, one moment, there it was on Amazon and I decided to try it. It was a little pricey but with the promise of a full refund, I was game to try it. I was willing to try anything that could help with my pain.To help manage my pain (before I was finally, after 6 years of suffering from pain, sent to a State Pain clinic to help manage the pain with opioids and other narcotics), I have tried surgery, Voltaren cream, lidocaine patches, spinal stimulator, tens machine, a compound made by my local pharmacy, Capsacien cream (when I put it on, I couldn't feel anything so I kept applying more and more. About 30 minutes later, it "kicked" in with so much heat, I literally thought I was on fire. And it hurt like the dickens- that kind of heat did NOT help, it only made things more painful for me), leg, back and foot nerve blocks to name some things I have tried, and NOT ONE of them offered a measure of relief. I get several measures of relief from Penetrex.After having to be on my feet all day, the first thing I do when I get home is take off my shoes and socks and put Penetrex on the parts of my feet that are so very sore. It often works immediately to remove pain. I may sit and put several light applications of Penetrex on a part of my foot where the pain has not yet subsided. I massage the cream into the skin and before very long, about 88-94% of the pain has lessened, if not gone completely away.I had a toe amputated a few years ago and the stump of it can be my most painful part of my foot. I'll rub the Penetrex on, massage, another light dose of cream, massage it in, and I may do this 4-7 times. I'm so sold on how well Penetrex works that I've told loads of people about it. I've also purchased several jars and given them to loved ones who also suffer from pain and it has worked miracles for them as well.Oh. I forgot to mention that it takes but a little Penetrex to do the job. The consistency of it is very nice. A 2-ounce jar can last for weeks.I would NEVER send my Penetrex back nor will I EVER stop using it!! It has been the ONLY topical item that has worked at ALL on my pain and I have tried a myriad of them. Thank the Heavens, literally, for whomever created Penetrex. Thank you, thank you!!! 💚💚💚💛💛💚💛💚💚💛💛💛💛💚💛💛💛💚😘
title: Best kept pain relief secret

author: Linda Thorn
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2020
review_content: I have scoliosis, arthritis, bone spurs, degenerative disc disease, a tethered spine that is pulled down 3 cm longer than normal.  My pain meds have stopped working.  My baclofen and Neurontin are doing nothing.  I can't get in to see my doctor for 3 weeks and the pain I have been in for the past few weeks has been unbearable.  I have been in my recliner with ice packs and heating pad, in tears.  I was googling for any suggestions for pain relief and ran across this cream.  I ordered it and got it about an hour ago.  OMG it worked.  The pain is so much better.  It is the most relief I have gotten from anything.  I have tried Hemp oil, Emu, you name it.  This is the first thing that stopped the pain.  I don't know whats in it, but it works people!!!!
title: Pain Relief!

author: Li-Wu
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2019
review_content: This stuff is magic!  I’m NOT kidding. I injured myself 6 months ago.  I have been swollen and in pain during that whole time.  I tried prescription ibuprofen cream and it didn’t help and I got a terrrible itchy rash.  After not being able to use the Rx I searched for something else  I found Penetrex and after reading the reviews ordered it.  I applied the cream once and it stopped the pain that hasn’t gone away in 6 months ( swelling was the same). After second application, it again stoppped the pain and swelling started to go down.  After third application pain relief was great and swelling was almost gone.  Did you hear me??  Swelling that has been there for 6 months was almost gone!!  I LOVE this stuff and will keep using it.  The information they send you says the benefits are cumulative the more times you use it, and it’s true!  I’m so happy I found this stuff!!!  AND even though I have leftover rash that is still healing from the Rx, the penetrex hasn’t hurt my skin in any way.  It doesn’t burn or sting upon application and has helped my old rash calm down.  Bonus!
title: It’s Magic!!

author: Orrie F.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2018
review_content: Hi,I have had arthritis pain in my hands and wrists for a few years. The pain was worse in my left hand, and I've experienced numbness there as well.Last year, I tripped and broke two bones in two places each in the back of my right hand. Even after the breaks healed, I had arthritis-like pain in my hand and wrist, including joints of the middle finger and thumb that were not damaged in the fall. The discomfort in my right hand was now worse than in my left hand.An acquaintance told me about Penetrex, and that it had worked wonders for him. So I tried a 2-oz. tub of it.And it worked. No miracles, but significant improvement.I started applying the product two or three times a day, and in a few days noticed a lessening of pain and stiffness. After a couple of weeks, I continued to apply Penetrex once a day, and the improvement continued. After a couple of months, I tried stopping the applications regularly, and my hands continued to feel pretty good.Now, however, the pain and numbness has returned, although not as bad as they were before I used Penetrex.I've started applying Penetrex again, and after three days, I am starting to feel improvement again.I certainly think Penetrex is worth a try. The price seems high, but after three months, the little 2-oz tub still has plenty left.
title: This product works - no miracles, but it definitely helps

author: areviewer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2019
review_content: Used per directions - but Penetrex did absolutely nothing to ease the pain. It neither gave instant relief (when desperately looking for a quick feeling of relief from the pain) nor gave long-term relief (when looking for relief that would come over time with usage as directed). If it really is working for the people praising this then I wonder what is the differentiator - does it work for only certain types? Anyway, never going to buy again and disappointed I cannot return this and get my money back and have to keep looking for an effective remedy for the pain.

author: JGO
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2021
review_content: Hello all, I'm giving this pain relief  cream a 5 star review because it really works! I only read one review and it was a good one so, I decided to make the purchase and I'm glad I did. I have metatarsalgia, capsulitis of the second toe and before using this cream, my pain level was 9 out of 10 now, it's about a 2 or 3. Thank God for this product as I am on my feet most of the day walking on concrete. If you have foot pain, try this hopefully it will work for you, the way it did for me. I have only been using this cream for three days I can't say enough about how well this product works!
title: Thank God for this product!

author: DeePar
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2018
review_content: First, I want to say that this product DID help a little bit, for just a little while, as I have found with all so-called, pain relief creams. I'm only giving this 3 stars because, for the price of this VERY little jar (2 oz/$18.00), I expected a LOT MORE in the way of pain relief! The smell isn't overpowering, so that's a good thing. The problem is that for a lot lower price, I can buy Ben-Gay, or some other, OTC cream that will do the SAME job that this does, for half or less than half the price. Penetrex is extremely over priced. I will not buy it again. I'm giving it 3 stars based on how it performs in comparison to other creams, and for the fact that the smell is pleasant and not overpowering. I have a herniated disc in my back, and I have tried a lot of pain relieving creams, serums, gels, etc....Penetrex performs as well as Ben-Gay, and lasts just about the same amount of time. If the manufacturers come up with a bigger jar and a better price, I may give them another chance. Until then, I will be a wise consumer and stick with Ben-Gay or Salonpas, and save a LOT of money!
title: Same Results As Lower Priced Creams

author: Sue
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2017
review_content: I first purchased this product when doing research in an attempt to help my husbnad with bursitis and neuropathy in his right foot. He was also diagnosed with arthritis in his big toe which was affecting his balance and ability to walk distances.  Upon delivery, we began using Penetrex 3 times a day.  Within a few days, he had regained some feeling in areas which were affected by his neuropathy.  After approximately 7 days his big toe was beginning to have slight mobility and the swelling from his bursitis was showing signs of improvement.  We are now applying Penetrex twice daily (morning and night) and continue to see improvement.  We have also noticed that a bunion he has had for years on the same affected foot has begun to shrink, allowing for even more comfort.It is a relief to see him be able to be more ambulatory and his pain level greatly decreased.  If you are suffering and applications of Penetrex could be tried on the affected area, we would strongly recommend trying this product.
title: we would strongly recommend trying this product

author: Derek P. Gilbert
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2017
review_content: I tried this because the reviews were excellent and the price is right. My left hip has ached at night for several years, making it difficult to sleep on that side because I can't stand to lie on it for more than five or ten minutes. After a couple days of using Penetrex twice a day, the ache is gone.  It helps with some other aches and pains, too--knee, wrist, elbow--but the most dramatic change is with that aching hip.My 80-year-old mother is now using it on an arthritic left knee. A cortisone shot only helped for a couple days, so I brought her a jar of Penetrex. She says it's doing more good than the cortisone.Added bonus: It has a pleasant smell.  If you ache, try this.
title: Helps my aching hip so I can sleep

author: Rachael Houser
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2019
review_content: I purchased this for my elderly aunt who is like a mom to me. She has fibromyalgia and is always in pain! It was on sale for prime day and I thought heck it’s worth giving it to her to see if it would help her and amazingly it did. She said she felt a difference right away but I wanted to give it a good couple months before actually saying it helped because with stuff like this sometimes it can seem like it’s helping at first but then it doesn’t. But this stuff has held up to the claim she moves better and isn’t nearly as stiff. She had a prescription for another cream like this that was from her doctor that she stopped all together and only uses this now, which I think speaks for it self. She also said that she was amazed at how little goes such a long way. She used it a few times a day at first and now just in the morning and the evening. It makes me feel good to see her moving and have her energy back, so thanks penetrex!!!
title: It really works!

author: Richelle Leigh Burns
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2019
review_content: I purchased the small jar as a trial for my father.  He has tried everything including CBD and Hemp products as he refuses to get the shots offered.  First couple applications of this cream he felt the area heat up but no relief.  After 4 or 5 days he was finally able to sleep soundly and was amazed.  Over 5 years of continuous pain in his hips and knees, his problem is so bad that he cannot even have massage and I'm a LMT, one week of this cream erased the pain so he can sleep.  Granted, this only masks the problem for which surgery is the only true "fix" right now.  But for a bedtime application risk-free and all-natural so he can sleep, well worth the investment. Already starting a second jar, looks as if we might have to take the subscription routecmonthly via Amazon's service.  Thank-you Penetrex for adding a bit more slumber to our lives.
title: He loves long walks on the beach

author: Currmama
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2019
review_content: I have neuropathy in my feet and most nights experience a great deal of 'burning' in the bottom of each foot. Of course, there was no such spot.  I read about Penetrex and decided it was worth a try.  And it DOES help tremendously.  The burning sensation isn't totally eliminated.  BUT it IS calmed down enough so that it is barely perceptible and my brain no longer registers it as PAIN!  Now I keep Penetrex on my nightstand and don't plan on doing without it again........
title: Penetrex = Better sleep for me

author: Joshua O.

review_content: First I would like to say thank you very much ! Finally a pain reliever that works !!!! My wife and I are firm believers in your product and use it daily. author: MissT
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2018
review_content: I wasn't going to use this stuff because after I bought it I spoke to my doctor and she said it was a scam, don't buy it. I can buy lidocane OTC in the drug store for less. I called the company at 11:00AM their time PST and the person answering the phone said no one was there to answer my question about return. I left my name and number. Someone did call back and left a message for me. I can return it by USPS and pay the shipping and then they will credit my shipping. I didn't want to get involved with that. (Who knows if they would get it.) So I kept it and used it.My review of it is that it is not a wonder pain reliever. I used it on my big toe.(I don't have an ingrown toenail, just tingling annoying pain.) It seemed to work, but then I thought it became the cause of additional pain in the entire front of my foot, so I stopped using it. Maybe too much is not good.

author: Tracy Hayes
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2020
review_content: I love this product. It works just as advertised. Docs suggested physical therapy. But, I chose to try Penetrex. I feel no lower back, shoulder, knee or elbow pain AT ALL! I forgot to use it just yesterday and the pain returned by mid-afternoon! I have tried all of the hot/cold creams. They sting (and stink) great for a few minutes and then- nothing. title: THIS STUFF WORKS!

review_content: The blisters were so bad after about 4 days of use that I had to discontinue the use of the product and actually had to see a dermatologist because the blisters were oozing and several had started to bleed. author: Christy
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2020
review_content: I hurt my knee several weeks ago and the swelling surrounding my knee was pretty bad. author: DRBSantos
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2019
review_content: I'd like to first say I'm skeptical of anything that seems too good to be true. I was handed a sample of this years ago.  I used it on a condition which normally would take several days to clear up. The condition resolved overnight. I didn't give penetrex the credit, but perhaps I should have. When I've forgotten I had this in the cabinet, I've suffered for several days, even weeks. When I remember that Penetrex seemed to save me the last time I was in that condition, I apply again. I've never applied it more than twice. It seems to provide much relief after just one application and complete relief after two. I can't say for sure it's the reason I seem to heal more quickly, but it sure seems like it.  It has a light, pleasant herbal scent to it, and it is almost not noticeable once rubbed in. Unlike menthol type products, this goes on and absorbs quickly and you won't smell funny.

author: Katie B
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2020
review_content: I’ve seen this product on Amazon for quite a while and always figured it couldn’t possibly be as good as people claimed, and that other products (think patches and creams) clearly had to be better. I WAS SO WRONG. I have deteriorating cartilage in both knees and after the first few uses I’m already feeling some relief — it’s not all gone, but seeing results so quick is promising. But the big hit was the arthritis in my toes — I normally cannot bend my big toes at all without pain. Literally after the first use I can curl and wiggle my toes with absolutely no pain! I can’t wait to see how far it will progress...I may be able to go on my tip-toes again! I’m completely blown away by this product after only 24 hours of having it. author: D

review_content: Since I herniated L4 and L5 3 years ago, Penetrex gives me relief. It’s the only thing that is effective for pain relief and mobility. I started out rubbing it into my lower back 5 times a day for the first week and by the end of the FIRST day, there was such an amazing relief that I could hardly believe it. date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2019
review_content: My husband and I first gave Penetrex a try over a year ago and have continued to keep this on hand ever since. author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2019
review_content: I realIze this is lengthy, but I want people who are having crazy painful hands and fingers to know exactly what I did so they can give it a try. The results may not be as dramatic as mine,but when I was desperately looking for something to relieve pain, a review like this was really helpful..I love that it doesn’t smell like Icy Hot, etc. I’ve only used it on my hands, however, because of the price. I hadn’t read anywhere prior to purchase that it should be applied like 7-8 x daily for a while and then titrate down until you’re at 1-2 x daily. I was super disappointed to read that because it was way to expensive for me to use it to that degree. But, having the success I’ve had using it far less often, I’ll probably buy a big jar and try using it as directed for a while and see if things can get even better. I’ve only used this on my hands—arthritis pretty bad in 4 fingers. For anyone planning to use it primarily on larger areas of the body, I’d get the big jar and give it a try. They appear to have a very liberal return policy so you don’t really have much to lose.Anyway, First thing in the morning and right before bed I apply a liberal amount-not gobs-and then wear compression gloves. They stay on overnight sometimes, and other times I use the finger splints made by the hand doctor.  After a night with the splints is when the efficacy of cream and gloves in the AM is most noticeable. I think when the gloves and cream stay on over night, the improvement just isn’t as noticeable. First thing in the morning, I warm my hands up with a little hot pack, apply the cream, put on the compression gloves, AND, do hand/finger exercises. The pain isn’t gone, but it’s 95% better. I can definitively say that doing the exercises alone brought not a tenth of the relief as doing the combination.Whether or not the cream, gloves, & splints would have been as effective WITHOUT the exercises, I don’t know. For those who are able, be religious with the hand and finger exercises. I’m absolutely amazed at the flexibility that’s returned and I know it’s a result of exercising. All I have to do is skip a day to realize their importance.Bottom line....I’m thrilled that I gave it a try and would definitely recommend others to do the same! Hope this info is helpful. Wishing you happier, healthier hands and fingers😉
title: Definitely worth a try! Worked for me!

date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2019
review_content: After a knee injury (hiking) I had experience knee pain for months. An MRI showed no damage to my knee, but the pain and swelling continued. It was a heck of lot less expensive than another injection....I used Penetrex twice daily for the 1st week, and daily after that, for about 2 weeks.Wow ….Knee pain gone, swelling had subsided...I do have an occasional flare up of minor pain and swelling,... Back to the Penetrex 1-2 daily...Good to go again.Vacationed 2 weeks in Europe w/o My Penetrex…. Walked 10-15 mi. daily. All was good. I have to admit,. author: David Forbes
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2014
review_content: When I started to deal with sciatic pain about two months ago, it was excruciating. I was waking up in the night with persistent pain in my lower back and left leg. In the early stages of dealing with all of this, I would have done almost anything, paid almost any reasonable amount for a solution that would allow me to get back to my normal routine of weekend warrior. So I tried this product based on reviews and a recommendation. There were reviews where people commented that they felt it helped them while a spouse or friend was telling them it was all a placebo effect or more about massaging the injured area. I thought, I don't care if it is a placebo effect, my only goal is to not be in pain. I can't say that it is the miracle lotion that others experience and describe - It did not cure my sciatica or immediately make me 100%. However, it did help. A lot of things in combination has helped me to overcome the pain that I was dealing with, and this was definitely part of the mix. I liked that you are directly addressing the area where you need relief as opposed to popping Motrin and have it flood your entire system. I actually feel like you can feel the lotion absorb into the area where applied. There is no overwhelming or bad smell. It's rather nice. I started with two, two ounce jars. They lasted me about two months. When I started noticing big positive improvements in mobility and how I was feeling, I decided to buy the larger jar for any relapse or other muscle pain I have to deal with. I do recommend - not as a miracle cure, but something that does work in the treatment of reducing pain and rehabbing an injury.
title: Not a Miracle Cure, But It Works For Me

author: Room 888
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2018
review_content: I'm 43 years old and I work in a midsized hotel (100 room) laundry. My job involves lots of repetitive motions-loading and unloading washers and dryers, pulling compacted linen from a chute, pushing and pulling heavy carts full of wet laundry and folding hundreds of pieces of linen. As a result, I have developed pain in my dominant (right) arm/elbow along with a tingling sensation in my ring and little finger. Sometimes the pain is so severe it interrupts my sleep. I had been using Icy Hot on the area, but it had only a mild effect and the scent was overpowering.Enter Penetrex.The first thing I noticed was the light, minty scent. It is pleasant and not at all offensive...and the texture of the creme is luxurious, almost like a fancy facial moisturiser. That makes it a joy to use...and the best part is...it actually works!I put some on before I go to work at night, slip on my elbow brace compression sleeve, and I can do my sometimes 12 hour shift with little to no pain. (I just put some on as I was writing this, and the tingling feeling in my fingers has gone away and sensation is returning!) When I get home in the morning, I apply another dosage of Penetrex before bed and put on my trusty compression sleeve-and I can sleep without interruption. 5 stars!

author: M. Robbins
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2018
review_content: I frequently have spasms in my neck that cause much pain and an inability to move my head in one direction.  I've always called it a "crick" in my neck, but it's really a muscle that is spasming.  I've used icy hot and other creams, ibuprofen, alieve, heat compresses, cold compresses, etc.  If I can't get the spasm to stop, then the pain will continue down to my shoulder / behind my shoulder blade, and give me headaches, etc.  It's miserable.  Enter in Penetrex.  I saw all the reviews and thought, hey, I'll try anything.  This stuff works.  It has no strong odor like icy hot and doesn't feel hot or cold.  I keep it by my bedside table and if my neck has a "crick" I'll rub it on before I go to bed.  I usually wake up at least once during the night and will rub some on again, and by the morning, I am 90% to completely better.  Mobility restored and pain free.  I don't know how it works, but it works.  No greasy feel either.  Rub it in and it absorbs well.  Fully recommend this!

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2017
review_content: This is the only product I have found after NUMEROUS purchases, both online & from pharmacies, that makes a difference with the horribly painful diabetic neuropathy in my toes, which I was experiencing every time I tried to get any sleep. I still have a minimal amount of pain occasionally, but it has gone from a 7/10 to a 2/10 when there is still pain, but most of the time there is no longer ANY pain in my toes. I try to be frugal with Penetrex and only use it on my toes, because cheaper products (like Blue Emu) do work fairly well on the other areas of my feet and ankles. The amount I am using means I will use a 2 oz. container of this every 3-4 weeks. If my budget wasn't so tight, I would use Penetrex generously on my toes, feet, and ankles 3-4 X every day.If you are using over-the-counter NSAID pain relievers (Aspirin, Ibuprophen, Naproxin, etc.) as a way of life like I was, remember, if you are using them every day, regularly, you are destroying your kidneys. title: VERY Effective Treating Diabetic Neuropathy ! ! ! ! ! (Haven't found anything better!)

author: Judy
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2020
review_content: I first tried Penetrex last year after I fell down my icy front steps and was purple from my waist to my knee. I liked that there was Arnica in it... it took months for the bruising to go away though but the cream helped with the pain. Since COVID my work has changed and I'm in Zoom meetings all day, suffering associated neck and back tension. I figured I'd try another container of Penetrex for this. I'd recommend it for muscle aches, it really has helped my neck and lower back. Would not recommend for arthritis in bony places like knees or hands.

author: Logan Clark
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2019
review_content: My mother is disabled with Fibromayalgia and Rheumatoid Arthritis and and one of the medications she was on a while back gave her minor nerve damage in her feet- mostly likely neuropathy. What started as her toes being a little numb grew to her constantly moving her feet when it bed because the tingles got so bad, even when she was trying to sleep. If she was up walking for errands, she would consistently have to stop to shake out her feet as the tingles grew to stabs of heat and pain the longer she walked. Shoes hurt her feet (even expensive therapy ones), walkers only did so much to keep pressure off of them and she was growing more and more upset about how her already limited mobility was being further impacted.And then we tried this stuff and everything changed. At first, she put it on a couple times a day as it recommends and said it was maybe helping a little bit. A couple weeks in, she calls me into her room and goes "So I maybe stopped using Penetrex for a couple days (ugh, mom why) because I thought it wasn't working, but now my feet are starting to hurt like before so I guess it was a gradual enough change that I didn't notice how much it was helping until I stopped!"Now she's been using it consistently enough that she can put it on about once a day and doesn't have to stop AT ALL when grocery shopping or walking for doctors appointments. Shoes don't hurt her feet as much (at least from the neuropathy standpoint) and she doesn't wiggle her toes in bed at all hours of the night. It pretty much had her in tears how excited she was when I pointed out that she made it through the entirety of WinCo without having to sit down because her feet hurt so bad.Nothing has helped with my moms chronic pain before so the fact this helped take some of that pain away is something I'm forever impressed by.
title: This stuff changed my mom's life in a big way!

author: Margaret Simmons
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2020
review_content: I injured my knee and along with the injury I have osteoarthritis. Along with physical therapy I ha d been prescribed a prescription gel. After all I had the prescription strength gel. I read so many positive reviews I decided to give it a try. I didn’t expect anything to really happen but was I wrong! After about a week the pain had subsided about 90%. I was amazed! I still have stiffness due to my arthritis but I am not hampered with pain. I use it only when I need it now. I’m a believer! Thanks for such a great product!

author: Momof3boys
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2019
review_content: My mother who is 72 years old and suffers from arthritis in her hands, fingers and knees has been using this product in the cream form for quite awhile with continued positive effects. It is a little expensive for someone on a fixed income, but a prescribed treatment has cost more in the past with less positive results.  My mom has often expressed that using this has helped her be able to not focus on the discomfort and pain of the arthritis and be able to move around better and use her hands better for tasks that require more small motor skills, such as drawing (which she loves to do as a hobby)!We recently received the roll on version of Penetrex but have not consistently used it yet -- I applied it to my hands and it seemed to dull the pain in the joints -- I have begun to notice arthritis in my fingers as well.  I will be also purchasing Penetrex if and when the arthritis progresses.

author: Don
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2020
review_content: It says apply 2 to 3 times per day for 7 to 10 days, and then as needed thereafter. And 18+ dollars for a measly 2 ounce jar is way too much, for way too little. I’ve only had it 4 days and the jar is almost empty. I don’t know how well it works and at that price and that a little bit of quantity, I’m never going to find out. Your price is too high, your quantity is too low. In the end you’re hurting your own business. At least that’s my opinion.Better to sell more for less, then try to sell less for more.

author: Ookie
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2019
review_content: for a few years now i am struggling in a battle with time and aging. muscle and joint aches and stiffness. tried several products and some are better than other, but each had one or two big flaws (short effectiveness, greasy, smell, ...).Last December I tried Penetrex cream, and since then i am sticking to it and spreading the good word. First of all, it WORKS!! it is definitively not equivalent of 800 mg of ibuprofen but for all everyday (aging) purposes it works.  after 15 minutes of application lower back and joint stiffness goes away. in case of sore muscles even faster.in addition it is not greasy, absorbs quickly, and mild odor goes away after a minute.one surprising fact, not related to quality of the product but to the company, is that recently they send me a free bottle of their roll-on version. existing customer!! that is a way to treat customers, no that "only new customers" nonsense.i am aware that people react differently to medications but would definitively recommend to everyone to try it, as i am to all my friend who complain to similar symptoms as mine

author: S. Foster
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2017
review_content: I initially ordered this product while looking for ways to manage pain resulting from a rotator cuff injury.  For those readers who have never had this type of injury, it can ache all day and night and flare up at any moment if you move the wrong way.  Because the product had great reviews, I thought I would give it a try.I will have to say that rarely have I been as delighted with a product as I am with Penetrex.  This is very effective in eliminating my pain when applied to the skin over my injury.  The pain goes away pretty quickly, and the product has a lovely, light minty scent that I adore.  It also has a nice, smooth consistency and quickly sinks into the skin, leaving no greasy residue on clothes or hands.  The product states that it does not heat or cool the skin, like some other products, but I have felt a cool sensation right after application.This next part might sound a bit peculiar, but I've also used the Penetrex on my lower arms and hands before going to bed to alleviate numbness and aching that occur during the night, due to what I assume is reduced blood flow.  Not only does that work, but the Penetrex has also helped to heal up some scarring I have from a bad encounter with Poison Oak.  I am thrilled, because I've been healing from this for about a year, and seeing this level of improvement makes me hopeful that all the scarring will eventually be gone.Thank you very much to the makers of Penetrex! author: Julie Vaughn
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2019
review_content: I’m unable to take anti inflammatory pain medication because I have a very sensitive stomach so I have looked into a lot of alternatives over the years because I have a long history of tendonitis in both arms and degenerative disk disease in my neck. I have tried every kind of topical pain relief and Penetrex in my opinion is by far the best thing available without a prescription. Most topicals peter out quickly, or they stink, or they are sticky or they burn my skin with that hot/cold thing. Not this stuff. It has a pleasant consistency and smell and you don’t even have to really rub it in but it seems to work even better with some deep massage.Just this last February I had an accident and managed to completely dislocate my left shoulder and fractured my greater tuberosity bone, and had to have surgery. I also sprained my right wrist and my left knee! I’m in Physical Therapy for all of this still and I tell all of my physical therapists about Penetrex because it helps me so much.I can only say 2 negative things about Penetrex. 1. I can only get it online. (Walgreens? CVS?) 2. It’s a little pricey. (but honestly it is worth every penny!) author: prasanthedward
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2019
review_content: I was at first hesitant to buy this product because others that I had tried were ineffective and the product isn't cheap. Eventually I bought a small jar and tried it out. After that I have regularly reordered this product well before I run out because I can't do without it. I have chronic neck pain, had a herniated disc and undergone disc replacement surgery. But I lost the normal lordotic arch of the cervical spine and am very prone to Trapezius spasms which in turn trigger a migraine (cervicogenic migraine). I tried Diclofenac cream (anti-inflammatory) with no effect. I take oral Tizanidine (muscle relaxant)  which helps with the spasm but makes me very drowsy. Now my daughter massages Penetrex into my neck and upper back muscles for about 10-15 minutes every night and the relief is almost immediate. It has really helped me to cut down on my NSAID use (which was upsetting my stomach like crazy) and I take Tizanidine very rarely now. This cream could put Allergan's Ana botulinum toxin out of business. I just hope they don't change any ingredients. I don't know how they concocted this but it has been done to perfection.
title: Works better than NSAID creams or musle relaxants

author: Stacey
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2017
review_content: I'm a teacher and I spend hours standing on my feet on hard concrete floors!  By the end of the day, I can barely walk without feeling like I'm walking on nails. I have suffered  severe heel pain for months and couldn't find anything that really worked!  I tried night splints, creams, heel wraps, ice packs you name it!  Nothing really worked!  Then I discovered penetrex during a desperate search for relief!  I first tried the 2 oz jar  (which lasted me just a week) and saw immediate results!  Within 24 hours I could feel a difference and by day 3 I could really feel a huge difference. When you first start using this product you are to put it on 4 times a day for the first 7 days and then as needed.  By the end of those 7 days I was walking around bare foot again with minimal pain!  I was then able to only use the product in the AM and the PM  or more if I started feeling inflammation  in-between times.  I had such great results I bought the 4 oz jar.  I'm now on my 2nd big jar, and honestly I barely have to use it now.  This stuff is amazing and truly works!  I call it my miracle cream! The moment I begin to feel pain, I rub some on and the pain is minimized!  I LOVE THIS STUFF!!!  It is expensive but well worth it!!!
title: Works miracles for foot pain!

author: Jessica S.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2018
review_content: I’ve been using Penetrex for quite a few years now, and was introduced to it by my parents. My parents love it, especially my mom who has fibromyalgia and other conditions. My dad who extremely healthy and active in farming, uses it for the occasional aches and pains as well.I’m in my mid thirties and have the standard occasional aches and pains that come with being the “weekend warrior”, gardening, and just life lol. I’ve also had some sacral and hip pain due child birth and tightness from running. This stuff is also great for aches in the neck and across the head (think sinus and stress/tension headaches...and keep out of the eyes lol).I even use it for my daughter when she has aches associated with colds and ear infections (do not use internally or inside the ear...just around the outside).It’s incredibly effective and great for minor to moderate pain. And, I think in combination with other topical therapies that use localized medications, over time, it can replace the extensive use of OTC medications like Advil.
title: Great Product
